markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Summons](/Feats.aspx?ID=4752) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Call of the Wild](/Feats.aspx?ID=4716)

</column>

---

Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water. You gain the primal summons order spell (page 381).
name: Primal Summons
